This game and the whole series is brilliant. The puzzles ramp up just enough to intrigue and guide you while not directly giving you a tutorial, instead focusing on the masterful story underlying them. It gets even better when you play the second game and continue the story on for another day or two.

This is a negative comment.
Why are games like these not a widespread genre? Off the top of my head, I can list Portal, Portal 2, Aperture Tag, and Lightmatter. And 3 of those are a series (although Aperture Tag is a fan game I believe). I'm seriously frustrated at the lack of a portal 3, or maybe a puzzle game where everything is hanging on strings and you have to play the game that way, while still pressure pushing buttons and things of that sort. Maybe a puzzle game where there's no gravity, you have to use something to push you around and you're not in an enclosed room so you can lose by blasting yourself into space. I don't know. There's so many options for this aggravatingly amazing genre and I'm infuriated by the lack of the genre's, um... Widespreadness? Me no has good vocab, sowwy. Anyways, yeah. Amazing game. You should play it.

神作，吹爆
虽然游戏画面不如近几年的新游，但在创意和可玩度上做的非常好，一开始可能略微有点单调，但在熟悉了游戏玩法之后，动脑筋去破解关卡的乐趣会让你沉浸在里面，游戏难度不高，玩起来会很有成就感。缺点就是3d效果可能会让人感觉恶心，毕竟是好多年前的游戏。我强忍着要吐的感觉通关了游戏，但游戏内容确实很优秀。

Modo Historia: 7 / 10

This was probably the best game I've played in a while, considering the fact that my game library isn't exactly stacked. This was puzzling to say the least, but it certainly had more in store than what I originally had thought the game was going to be. It was an excellent surprise to say the least, and I'm glad that I stuck around till the credits.

Worth buying for sure.

我的妈完全就是一恐怖游戏，到后面狭窄地图的时候特别害怕感觉开门就会蹦出来异形。
总体来说挺棒的，就是最后一关的三个眼睛只有六分钟时间，断掉还要从头来，第一次弄的时候有些麻烦。
摄像头没有拆完，收音机也没有找完，但我不会再回去了！这恐怖游戏太害怕了。

这游戏最大的乐趣是听GLaDos口胡和调戏Turret

I'm fairly new to gaming in general, so the mechanics took some getting used to, but it was overall really fun and not too difficult to get through -- just took a little bit of extra thinking and a some save files haha Can't wait to play the second installment!

Probably everyone knows about portal by now but for those who don't , it is a puzzle platformer game which relies heavily on your portal gun which can open 2 portals. After all these years, i still find everything enjoyable, the puzzles are insanely well crafted and clever, Glados is a dickhead who constantly teases you and best of all, you don't know shit about whats going on with the story. The story relies on you finding tons of easter eggs but probably your best bet is youtube if you want to understand what happened. Overall don't mind it being old, buy the bundle at an insanely low price and spend some quality time playing Portal.

The first Portal game is often overlooked due to the popularity of the sequel, however I feel the first game is equally enjoyable and does a great job establishing the universe of the Portal games. The game is challenging and enjoyable. The characters in the game are quirky and really memorable. I would recommend this game to anyone who was looking for a fun PC game. If you wait for it on sale you can get it, and the second game for dirt cheap.

The first valve game I ever played. Grew up watching my step-father play it, I was mesmerized. Sure, I didn't exactly understand all the puzzles or the story, but I worked through them all with minor help. This game introduced me to Valve, and helped shape my next experiences with video games.
